# Getting Support

Thank you for using the SpearIT Project Framework! Here's how to get help:

---

## Where to Get Help

### üêõ Bug Reports
Found something broken? Please report it via **GitHub Issues**:
- [Report a Bug](https://github.com/SpearIT-LLC/project-framework/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml)

### üí° Feature Requests
Have an idea for a new feature or enhancement? Share it via **GitHub Issues**:
- [Request a Feature](https://github.com/SpearIT-LLC/project-framework/issues/new?template=feature_request.yml)

### ‚ùì Questions & Help
Have a question or need help using the framework or plugin? Ask via **GitHub Discussions**:
- [Start a Discussion](https://github.com/SpearIT-LLC/project-framework/discussions)

### üí¨ General Conversation
Want to share your project, discuss ideas, or chat with other users? Join us in **GitHub Discussions**:
- [General Discussion](https://github.com/SpearIT-LLC/project-framework/discussions)

---

## Response Time

This is an open-source project maintained by SpearIT, LLC. We aim to respond within 1-2 business days, though response times may vary based on complexity and maintainer availability.

## Before Reaching Out

Please check these resources first:

1. **Documentation:** Review the [README.md](../README.md) and framework documentation
2. **Existing Issues:** Search [open issues](https://github.com/SpearIT-LLC/project-framework/issues) to see if your question has been answered
3. **Discussions:** Browse [discussions](https://github.com/SpearIT-LLC/project-framework/discussions) for similar topics

---

Thank you for being part of the SpearIT Project Framework community!
